New_Brunswick.Sayreville Public Schools:
The Sayreville Public Schools are a comprehensive community public school district that serves students in kindergarten through twelfth grade from Sayreville, in Middlesex County, New Jersey, United States.
As of the 2011-12 school year, the district's seven schools had an enrollment of 5,687 students and 446.8 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 12.73:1.
The district is classified by the New Jersey Department of Education as being in District Factor Group "DE", the fifth-highest of eight groupings.
